name: Content Clarity
description: Tests the model's ability to create clear, understandable presentation content

prompts.text: Create a presentation explaining how blockchain technology works to non-technical business executives. Make complex concepts clear and understandable without oversimplifying. Use appropriate analogies and visual descriptions to enhance clarity.

Create a presentation explaining the process of photosynthesis for a middle school science class. Ensure the content is clear, age-appropriate, and builds concepts in a logical sequence. Use simple language while maintaining scientific accuracy.

concept_clarity.description: Clear explanation of concepts and ideas

logical_flow.description: Logical progression and organization of information

jargon_management.description: Appropriate use or explanation of technical terms
